name: nativescript-photoviewer
description: A simple Photo-viewer component for NativeScript based on NYTPhotoViewer pod for iOS and ImageGalleryViewer for Android.

scripts.tsc.dist: npm run dist.clean && tsc -skipLibCheck --outDir dist && npm run dist.copy
scripts.dist.copy: cp -R platforms dist && cp ../README.md dist && cp photoviewer.d.ts dist && cp package.json dist
scripts.build: npm i && ts-patch install && npm run tsc.dist
scripts.clean: npm run demo.clean && npm run demo-ng.clean
scripts.test: npm run tslint && npm run tslint.demo && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns build android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd ../demo && ns plugin remove nativescript-photoviewer && ns plugin add ../src/dist && ns install
scripts.preparedemo-ng: npm run build && cd ../demo-ng && ns plugin remove nativescript-photoviewer && ns plugin add ../src/dist && ns install
scripts.setup: npm run build && cd ../demo && npm i
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-photoviewer && cd ../src
scripts.setupandinstall: npm i && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../src
scripts.development.setup: npm run setup && npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-photoviewer && cd ../src
scripts.generate.typings.ios: cd ../demo && TNS_DEBUG_METADATA_PATH="$(pwd)/metadata" tns build ios && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH="$(pwd)/typings" tns build ios && echo 'Now look for your library typings in demo/typings!'
scripts.generate.typings.android: java -jar ../../android-dts-generator/dts-generator/build/libs/dts-generator.jar -input ./classes.jar -output platforms/android/typings && rimraf classes.jar && echo '##### Done! Deleted src/classes.jar, and generated typings in src/platforms/android/typings'
